name: Grandfather's Road - Heritage Game Jam 2020
description:
Our country have comes a long way since before it have even become independent.

Run through the different era to see what have happen throughout the years.

Break down obstacle and explode objects being thrown at you by clicking on them.

Gather comrades and run together towards the end.

Sacrifices have to be made sometimes but together we will succeed.

Jump, slide, wall jump over obstacles to reach the goal. Sometime you might even need to step over other to reach your goal.

Game Controls:

- Space to Jump

- Ctrl to Slide

- Certain objects are breakable if you click on them.

Game Made in Unity.
